Description: Excellent near mint condition 2016 Gibson Custom Shop Les Paul Axcess Custom in Alpine White All accessories with certificate of authenticity included. Plays, sounds and looks as great as when it came out of the Gibson Nashville USA Custom Shop This is a $6K U.S Custom Shop flagship model so no low ball offers please. The starting bid price is less than half of it's value so bid with confidence on this gorgeous instrument and find all the Gibson Custom Shop specs at the site below: http://www.gibson.com/Products/Electric-Guitars/2016/Custom/Les-Paul-Custom-Axcess-Floyd.aspx#LPXCAWGF1 Sale price $5,899 direct from Gibson Custom Shop The Les Paul Custom Axcess Floyd from Gibson Custom combines the modern playability, light weight and tone of Gibson’s popular Axcess range, dressed up in style inspired by the Les Paul Custom of “fretless wonder” lineage. Drenched in modernized playability and tone features, the Les Paul Axcess Custom lives to serve those who value comfort, speed, and a slightly more aggressive version of Gibson’s signature humbucker tone. Players from Alex Lifeson of Rush, to Tommy Shaw of Styx, to Dave Amato of REO Speedwagon rely on the Axcess as an everyday player capable of delivering on their audiences’ high expectations of tone, while providing a lightweight, contoured-for-comfort and stage-ready guitar that stands up to the rigors of the road. "Heel-less" Feel Reach all 22 frets unimpeded 496R and 498T Humbuckers Powerful ceramic magnets make these scorching humbuckers perfect for modern rock "Belly" Carved Back Fits at the ribs for exceptional comfort Slightly Thinner Body Depth Adds to light weight while increasing overall comfort Floyd Rose Equipped The stay-in-tune whammy standard Custom Looks Full Les Paul Custom regalia brings black-tie elegance to the Axcess Axcess Heel Carve: Full access to all 22 frets, with ease Pickups: Powerful 496R and 498T humbuckers Belly Carve: A unique back carve for for hours of comfortably play Body: Lightweight design to reduce playing fatique Vibrato System: Floyd Rose with locking nut Custom Appointments: Multi-ply bindings, gold hardware and block inlays Body Top Back
